CustomField.description: Value set when the opportunity is created: = 'P' + 7 numbers (if application source = PERSO) = 'SP' + 7 numbers (if application source = SPO) = To Be Defined for LV.com (number visible to client?) Perso and SPO will have the same index (starts with 0300000). By Workflow, when the Opportyunity is created, set the value with P or SP (depending on application source) and concatenate with Opportunity.SPO_BriefCode__c (by sure to have 7 digits)
CustomField.label: Order Number
